description.lang: The Wireless Lighting Control LCD Remote works with lamp modules, fluorescent and appliance modules, dimmers, switches and receptacles, as well as outdoor modules, Z-Wave certified door locks and Z-Wave certified thermostats.Z-Wave LCD Remote Control gives you easy control over both individual Z-Wave enabled appliances and whole scenes. A logical control layout in a compact design means you can use this ergonomic remote one-handed comfortably. A backlit keypad and LCD screen

deviceDescription.productName: GE 45633 Z-Wave Wireless Lighting Control Advanced Remote
